Name: Polyamide fabric Cordura
Description: This is a polyamide fabric, in which due to the special structure of the thread (made from cut and twisted fibers) fourfold resistance to abrasion is achieved compared to plain nylon, also consisting of polyamide. Significantly superior to conventional fabric in tensile strength and abrasion resistance. Used for the manufacture of equipment for various purposes: bags, backpacks and additional items to them, waist and bag belts, cases for carrying weapons and so on.
